column2: companies".  Therefore as  set out in the said circular, the  level of seniority that was

column1: taken  into  consideration was  "'Middle  Level  Management"  in  consideration of the

column2: stipulated  in  the  said Management Circular No.30.  The  Petitioners application has
been  refused  since  he  had  failed  to  qualify  in  the  said  category based  on  the  post
held at the time the application was made for the concessionary permit.
